verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] deliver remarks Thursday at a White House ceremony during the Wounded Warrior Project Soldier Ride .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: deliver] [ARG1: remarks] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARGM-LOC: at a White House ceremony] [ARGM-TMP: during the Wounded Warrior Project Soldier Ride] .
